metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8879 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Dolibarr ERP/CRM 4.0.4 allows password changes without supplying thecurrent password, which makes it easier for physically proximate attackersto obtain access via an unattended workstation.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
